post.body: You found a GP prescribing antibiotics? Well done!
Welcome to Oxford :-)!
Happy humbug!
oxford mot empty any more. Though perplexed as to why - like a giant jumble sale!
cheers. BBC how many?!
Mac: download Handbrake: set to iPhone, drag result to iTunes. PC: google the question!
tried the Dubreq iStylophone app? Just as annoying, but on your phone for instant audio fartage!
If u r in Oxford then Broad Street now has an Apple retailer now called Western Conputers. Not sure of prices-ring em?
Been there, got the snotty hanky !
Cardigans: "Long gone before daylight" album. Perfect complement to Bon Iver. Also, Jolene by Ray laMontagne
WH Smith, anyone?
great album list - look forward to Part 2!
It's tempting. Bit parky out though.
Go see "The Reader". It had me in bits.
Heading for Gourmet Burger shortly. Yum!
Wrap up warm! And apropos 2009, may all your Quality Street be the purple hazelnutty ones...
Gotta love Dr Who DVD documentaries. Even after 20 years the actors can remember just how much they hated each other.
Christmas lunch at Kitsons - totally yummy! http://snipurl.com/93vmu
Merry Christmas tweeters. Hope your socks are full!
Dr Who "The girl in the fireplace" is finally on the iTMS. Yay!
